body_html:
As per log , Windows bazel build is failing with below error -

external/highwayhash\highwayhash/endianess.h(56): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'sys/param.h': No such file or directory
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 92.322s, Critical Path: 3.10s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully

Looks like google/highwayhash@fd3d9af fixed the endianess.h build on Windows.
Will update the highwayhash library to include commit google/highwayhash@fd3d9af , hope that will help.

body:
As per log , Windows bazel build is failing with below error -
```
external/highwayhash\highwayhash/endianess.h(56): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'sys/param.h': No such file or directory
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 92.322s, Critical Path: 3.10s
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully
```

Looks like https://github.com/google/highwayhash/commit/fd3d9af80465e4383162e4a7c5e2f406e82dd968 fixed the endianess.h build on Windows.
Will update the highwayhash library to include commit https://github.com/google/highwayhash/commit/fd3d9af80465e4383162e4a7c5e2f406e82dd968 , hope that will help.
